message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR 

This paper proposes a method for action recognition in videos using a hierarchy of mid-level action elements. The method involves unsupervised generation of spatiotemporal segments from videos, discriminative clustering to discover mid-level action elements, and structured models to capture spatial, temporal, and hierarchical relations among the segments. This work is primarily focused on computer vision and machine learning, which suggests that the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves unsupervised learning and structured models, which are relevant to sub-categories such as cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper deals with video analysis, which is relevant to cs.MM (Multimedia).
